pages.text: $(c)Mining Fatigue$() is a negative effect that is normally only applied by Guardians.$(p)While active, your mining speed is reduced by 20% per level.$(p)It is the direct opposite of $(9)Haste$().

pages.title: Brewing Recipe
pages.text: This potion can be crafted with a $(9)Potion of Haste$() and a Fermented Spider Eye.$(p)It can be extended, strengthend, or turned into a splash potion with the usual ingredients.
